articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Gavin Newsom says California isn't ready for statewide crypto regulation.
articles.title: Crypto Advocates Cheer California Governor’s Veto of Regulatory Bill

articles.author: Sander Lutz
articles.description: A new job listing from the entertainment giant seeks an attorney to guide its aggressive—but still hush-hush—push into Web3.
articles.title: Disney Pushes Further Into Crypto, DeFi, NFTs With Recent Job Post

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Digital assets are still behaving like “risk assets,” according to Bank of America analysts, but stablecoin inflows are a positive sign.
articles.title: Stablecoin Flows to Crypto Exchanges Bode Well for Market Recovery: Bank of America

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James's lawsuit says Nexo is "falsely representing" that it complies with the state's securities regulations.
articles.title: Crypto Lender Nexo Hit With Enforcement Actions From Eight States

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Kevin is still a blocky beast, but the rest of the artwork has been upgraded as Pixelmon reveals its do-over roadmap.
articles.title: NFT Game Pixelmon Attempts Comeback After $70M ‘Horrible’ Art Reveal

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: The American retailer sees potential in virtual spaces, launching worlds for live events and other brands.
articles.title: Walmart Debuts Roblox Worlds as ‘Testing Ground’ for the Metaverse

articles.description: LUNC still only trades for $0.0003.
articles.title: Terra’s Luna Classic Pumps 40% as Binance Plots Supply Burn

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The $172 million assets under management in short Bitcoin funds is the highest it's been since the first one launched in January 2020.
articles.title: Bitcoin Short Investment Funds Hit All-Time High of $172M: CoinShares

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: Australia’s pilot for its eAUD is due to be completed by next mid-2023, the country’s central bank said today.
articles.title: Australia Pushes Ahead With Central Bank Digital Currency, Announces Pilot Timeline

articles.description: Rich Widmann, the Web3 lead at Google Cloud, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 how Google Cloud is trying to "build a giant bridge" between Web2 and Web3, and the problem with crypto "purity tests."
articles.title: Google Cloud's Web3 Lead at Mainnet 2022: The Problem With Crypto 'Purity Tests'

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: With Apple introducing a hefty tax on NFT sales on its in-app store, Tim Sweeney said the move would crush another new technology.
articles.title: 'Apple Must Be Stopped' as Web2 Firm Launches 30% NFT Tax: Epic Games CEO

articles.author: Will McCurdy
articles.description: Hackers likely employed a “brute force” attack using a previously exploited weakness related to the vanity address generator Profanity.
articles.title: Hackers Nab Nearly $1 Million in Crypto From Ethereum ‘Vanity Adress’ Exploit

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) is now trading at a record discount of more than 35% compared to the value of the underlying asset.
articles.title: More Woes for Grayscale Investors as Largest Bitcoin Fund Hits New All-Time Low

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: A new proposal could see victims of crypto theft get their funds back. Still, the industry has doubts about a “reversible” Ethereum token.
articles.title: Crypto Has No ‘Undo Button’ Say Researchers Behind New Reversible Ethereum Tokens

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: The world’s largest crypto exchange Binance will apply for a license this time, as Japan looks set to adopt Web3-friendly policies.
articles.title: Crypto Exchange Binance Eyes Return to Japan 4 Years After Exit: Report

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: South Korean authorities said the international police organization had issued a red notice for Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon.
articles.title: Interpol Slaps Terra Co-Founder Do Kwon With Red Notice: Report

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Ryan Selkis says regulators should be a part of the crypto conversation.
articles.title: ‘Bear Markets Are Good’ for Cleaning House: Messari CEO

articles.author: Jason Nelson
articles.description: Brian Armstrong, head of the largest U.S. cryptocurrency exchange, says he feels called to defend the industry.
articles.title: Going Public ‘Put Us on the Main Stage’: Coinbase CEO

articles.author: André Beganski
articles.description: Jeremy Kauffman expressed contempt for the SEC as its lawsuit with the regulator reaches a critical point.
articles.title: SEC Is 'Out to Damage or Destroy' Crypto Industry in America: LBRY CEO

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: As ETH dropped and the SEC loomed, the NFT community celebrated the first International NFT Day on Tuesday.
articles.title: This Week on Crypto Twitter: Outrage as SEC Claims All Ethereum Transactions Happen in USA

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: It's the investment bank's second $100 million investment in a Bitcoin mining company this summer, despite the crypto bear market.
articles.title: Bitcoin Miner Iris Energy to Sell $100 Million in Equity to B. Riley

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Uniswap wants to "bring your digital asset experience into one place." Uniswap Diamond, and the acquisition of NFT aggregator Genie, will help.
articles.title: How Uniswap Is Taking Aim at Coinbase and Binance

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: ETH is down 19% since the merge. XRP ballooned this week when news broke that the SEC's lawsuit against Ripple may soon come to a conclusion.
articles.title: This Week in Coins: Ethereum Takes Another Week of Losses, XRP Soars

articles.author: Ben Munster
articles.description: The merge has inflicted chaos upon Ethereum—was it all worth it? Some Ethereum loyalists aren’t so sure
articles.title: Was the Ethereum Merge a Mistake?

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Dapper’s official NFL platform has topped the NFT charts lately, thanks to rising activity on days when real-world games are played.
articles.title: NFL All Day NFT Sales Surge on Sundays During Football Games

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: Ethereum co-founder Vitalik Buterin said that all blockchains, including Dogecoin and Zcash, looking to scale should move to proof of stake.
articles.title: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin 'Very Hopeful' Dogecoin Moves to Proof of Stake

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Solana's Anatoly Yakovenko believes a juggernaut IP could emerge from the current crop of NFT projects.
articles.title: NFTs Will Spawn the Next Marvel or Disney, Says Solana Founder

articles.author: Guillermo Jimenez,Jason Nelson
articles.description: Legal experts say the CFTC's action against the founders of bZx and Ooki DAO could have far-reaching implications for the DeFi industry.
articles.title: CFTC Sues a DAO, Raising Legal Questions for DeFi Founders and Users

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Both the SEC and Ripple have filed motions for summary judgment, each asking the judge to rule in their favor without a trial.
articles.title: XRP Jumps 44% in a Week After Ripple Moves to Dismiss SEC Lawsuit

articles.author: Liam J. Kelly
articles.description: Inca Digital just landed a contract with government defense agency DARPA to “visualize how digital assets implicate national security.”
articles.title: DARPA Is Bankrolling Research Into Crypto and National Security

articles.description: Steven Goldfeder, co-founder and CEO of Arbitrum developer Offchain Labs, tells Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 how Arbitrum is handling its recent bug, how he thinks about competitors to Arbitrum, and how to convince DeFi users that bridging funds is safe even when there are so many hacks and security failures in the DeFi space. He also teases the "full vision" for Arbitrum since it's still in beta.
articles.title: Steven Goldfeder of Offchain Labs Talks Arbitrum Bug and Layer-2 Competition

articles.description: Hart Lambur, founder of DeFi project UMA Protocol, talks to Decrypt's Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 all about what UMA does and what they have in store for the next iteration of their oracle, and how to write decentralized financial contracts.
articles.title: Meet 'Funky Crypto Finance Lab' UMA Protocol

articles.description: Alex Tapscott, co-author of the 2018 crypto book "Blockchain Revolution," talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about how big companies that in the past thought crypto wasn't "ready for primetime" are now more willing to invest in public blockchains. At the same time, he warns, "I don't want to overstate the culture shift too much."
articles.title: 'Blockchain Revolution' Author Alex Tapscott at Mainnet 2022: Big Companies Are Warming to Public Blockchains

articles.description: Paul Brody tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 why EY is "all in on public blockchains" and why any big companies that are still building private, closed blockchains don't get it.
articles.title: Ernst & Young Is 'All In on Public Blockchains': Paul Brody at Mainnet 2022

articles.author: Ziwang
articles.description: Compute North provides data centers for crypto mining giants such as Compass Mining and Marathon Digital, and owes some $500 million to 200 creditors.
articles.title: Bitcoin Mining Data Center Firm Compute North Files For Bankruptcy

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: The proposed plan involves deploying Harmony’s treasury towards both recovery of the assets and development of the protocol.
articles.title: Harmony Publishes Revamped Horizon Bridge Recovery Plan

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: Despite market-wide bearish sentiment, gaming and metaverse-related tokens including GODS and APE have posted significant weekly gains.
articles.title: Gaming Tokens GODS, APE Up Double-Digits Over The Week

articles.author: Tim Hakki
articles.description: The Economic Crime and Corporate Transparency bill modernizes existing legislation to counter new forms of money laundering and cyber crime.
articles.title: United Kingdom Introduces Bill to Make Crypto Seizures ‘Easier and Quicker’

articles.author: Andrew Asmakov
articles.description: A New York court has granted the IRS permission to serve a 'John Doe' summons on a bank that provided services for SFOX customers.
articles.title: IRS Targets Crypto Tax Evaders With M.Y. Safra Bank Summons Over SFOX Data

articles.author: Stacy Elliott
articles.description: The popular smart contract platform will soon see accelerated transaction times.
articles.title: Cardano Blockchain Moves Forward With Vasil Upgrade

articles.author: Kate Irwin
articles.description: The crypto exchange denies reports of a recent $100 million test trade that could be seen as “prop trading.”
articles.title: Coinbase Rejects Proprietary Trading and Crypto ‘Market Maker’ Allegations

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: It’s official: Helium is migrating to Solana following a vote. Nova Labs CEO Amir Haleem explains why Helium needed to make the change.
articles.title: Helium Founder Explains Why the Crypto Wireless Network Is Moving to Solana

articles.description: Kara Calvert, Head of U.S. Policy at Coinbase, talks with Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to talk about the proposed legislation she's tracking, how Coinbase is navigating regulation, and wanting to see a replacement for the SEC's Howey Test.
articles.title: Coinbase Policy Chief Kara Calvert Talks SEC Enforcement at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Messari CEO Ryan Selkis joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts to kick off our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022. He talked SEC Chair Gary Gensler and regulatory enforcement, DeFi growth and building during a bear market, the Ethereum merge, and had a message for the folks at home.
articles.title: Messari CEO Ryan Selkis Talks Bear Market, DeFi, and SEC at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Solana founder Anatoly Yakovenko joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Andrew Hayward in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 and talked up Helium's move to Solana, the Solana Saga Android phone, and even gave his take on the Ethereum merge.
articles.title: Solana Founder Anatoly Yakovenko Talks Saga Phone, Helium, and ETH Merge at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Uniswap Labs COO Mary-Catherine Lader joined Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Liam Kelly in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 and talked about how the leading DEX is expanding into new areas and taking on big exchanges like Binance and Coinbase.
articles.title: Uniswap's Big Plans for Taking on Binance and Coinbase: COO Mary-Catherine Lader at Mainnet 2022

articles.description: Jeremy Kauffman, whose decentralized video sharing platform LBRY is involved in a securities lawsuit with the SEC, tells Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Sander Lutz what will happen next, and why he's running for office in New Hampshire, in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022.
articles.title: LBRY CEO Jeremy Kauffman at Mainnet 2022: We've Been Fighting the SEC for 5 Years

articles.description: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer talks to Decrypt's Andrew Hayward and Kate Irwin in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 about reasons for optimism despite the NFT market cooling down, adding support for NFTs on more blockchains, and his excitement around NFTs for gaming.
articles.title: OpenSea CEO Devin Finzer at Mainnet 2022: 'Cambrian Explosion' Coming for NFT Use Cases

articles.description: Audius founder and CEO Roneil Rumburg joins Decrypt's Kate Irwin and Andrew Hayward in our Decrypting Mainnet series at Mainnet 2022 to tell us what's new with the decentralized music-streaming app and who its competitors in web3 music services are.
articles.title: How Web3 Music App Audius Hit 7.5 Million Users: CEO Roneil Rumburg at Mainnet 2022

articles.author: Tom Farren
articles.description: The deal with Kraft Group makes Chain the official "blockchain and Web3 sponsor" of the Patriots, New England Revolution, Gillette Stadium, and Patriot Place.
articles.title: NFT Software Company Chain Inks Four-Year Deal With New England Patriots

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: GitHub pulled the tool’s code from its website within hours of the Treasury's ban last month. The code-sharing platform has now apparently rescinded its ban.
articles.title: Ethereum Coin Mixer Tornado Cash Is Back on GitHub

articles.author: Sujith Somraaj
articles.description: The ultrasound money meme is taking life, with Ethereum’s daily token issuance dropping following the network upgrade.
articles.title: Ethereum Token Issuance Plummets 95% Following Merge

articles.description: Magic Eden launched 1 year ago and already has a $1.6 billion valuation. It started as a marketplace only for Solana NFTs, but now it’s opening up to Ethereum. Co-founder and CEO Jack Lu tells Dan Roberts and Stephen Graves all about the company’s goals, his take on NFT backlash, Solana vs Ethereum, and the Ethereum merge and its impact on NFTs. Watch and subscribe to the gm podcast on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Inside NFT Unicorn Magic Eden With CEO Jack Lu

articles.description: Web3 fashion startup BNV is building out its own metaverse to better fit the fashion world than the "voxelated" worlds of Sandbox and Decentraland. BNV CEO Richard Hobbs spoke to Decrypt's Sander Lutz about why it's necessary, ahead of BNV's special event during Paris Fashion Week.
articles.title: BNV CEO Richard Hobbs on Creating a Fashion-First Metaverse

articles.description: The Ethereum merge will happen this week. In this serving of Decrypt-O's, Kate Irwin explains the Bellatrix upgrade and the shadow fork, Dan Roberts predicts the impact Ethereum's move to proof of stake will have on Bitcoin's energy use PR problem (plus commentary from Dan Held from the gm podcast), and Sander Lutz hits the street in Hollyweird to ask regular folks if they know and care about the merge. (Production by Zack Edelman, editing by Jason Nelson.)
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 2: Who Cares About the Ethereum Merge?

articles.description: The Ethereum Merge to Proof of Stake (PoS) is one of the most significant technological upgrades in recent history. But why evolve Ethereum at all? Learn the difference between PoW and PoS, why PoS will decrease Ethereum’s carbon footprint by 99.95%, and more in the Infura Web3 Dev Series: The Merge Explained. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.
articles.title: Decrypt Learn: The Ethereum Merge

articles.description: The years-anticipated Ethereum Merge is less than a week away. Everyone is buzzing about what it will mean for the crypto market and for proof of work vs proof of stake, but what will the effect be on NFTs? Dan Roberts, Andrew Hayward, Kate Irwin and Sander Lutz break it down in our latest live roundtable.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: What the Ethereum Merge Means for NFTs

articles.description: Eat your Decrypt-O’s! In the debut episode, Sander Lutz hits the street to ask people about their privacy concerns in the wake of the government’s Tornado Cash crackdown; Kate Irwin shares headlines on the wackiest Web3 stories, from Crypto.com sending a woman $10 million by accident to Eminem and Snoop Dogg getting Twitter hate for their Bored Apes; and Dan Roberts serves up a rant about Gary Gensler. (Production and editing by Zack Edelman.)
articles.title: Decrypt-O's Ep. 1: Tornado Cash Privacy Fears, Bored Ape VMAs Hate, Sheriff Gensler

articles.description: Dan Held is an old-school Bitcoiner who has been in the space since the very beginning; he sold his price app ZeroBlock to Blockchain.info in 2013. But while he's largely seen as a Bitcoin maximalist by his half a million fans on Twitter, he tells Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott he's a "permissive" and "open-minded" Bitcoiner: he's watching the Ethereum Merge closely, and he admits Ethereum's move to proof of stake will put pressure on Bitcoin's energy use. Watch Episode 18 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Bitcoiner Dan Held Talks Ethereum Merge, PoW vs PoS, and NFTs

articles.description: Decrypt’s Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, Jason Nelson, and Sander Lutz break down all the angles, from the timing to the expected market reaction to the technical elements.
articles.title: #DecryptLIVE: Ethereum Merge Is on the Horizon
